[DQC.US.0109.9570] The concept us-gaap:ConcentrationRiskPercentage1 with value 0.118 is used with the ConcentrationRiskByBenchmarkAxis with a benchmark of us-gaap:CostOfGoodsTotalMember. The risk associated with this benchmark of us-gaap:CustomerConcentrationRiskMember is not approproiate to this benchmark. Consider using an extension risk or one of the risks associated with this banch mark such as GeographicConcentrationRiskMember, SupplierConcentrationRiskMember, ProductConcentrationRiskMember, LaborForceConcentrationRiskMember, UnionizedEmployeesConcentrationRiskMember
The properties of this us-gaap:ConcentrationRiskPercentage1 fact are:
Period :2019-04-01 to 2020-03-31 Dimensions : us-gaap:ConcentrationRiskByTypeAxis=us-gaap:CustomerConcentrationRiskMember, srt:MajorCustomersAxis=oesx:CustomerOneMember, us-gaap:ConcentrationRiskByBenchmarkAxis=us-gaap:CostOfGoodsTotalMember Unit : pure
